description:
Everything you need to clean and waterproof leather boots and hiking footwear. The formula won't affect breathability and will protect your footwear from rain, mud and salty puddles.

  • Includes one 118ml bottle of ReviveX Boot Cleaner Concentrate, one 118ml bottle of ReviveX Leather Gel Water Repellent Treatment, a boot brush and a textured applicator cloth
  • Ideal for full-grain leather boots
  • Safe for waterproof-breathable laminates including GORE-TEX and eVent
name: Gear Aid Revivex Leather Boot Care Kit
